The following quiz is designed to provide an overview about the basics of data protection 
for human subject research. The questions are based on a course originally developed 
by Thomas Bengfort from the [Max Planck Institute for Human Development (MPIB)](https://www.mpib-berlin.mpg.de). 

# How To Play

To start the quiz, either click on *Quiz* in the top bar or scroll down to 
[Start Quiz](#start-quiz) below and click the provided link. 

All assignments in the quiz are multiple choice questions: one or multiple answers 
are correct. To pick one or more statements, simply select the respective 
fields and click the right arrow button to proceed to the next question. 

![](imgs/proceed.png){width="80%"}

If you want to go back to the previous question, click on the left arrow button. 

![](imgs/previous.png){width="80%"}

Every question card also contains an optional hint message. If you are stuck 
with a question, click the lightbulb for help. 

![](imgs/hint.png){width="80%"}
![](imgs/hint_clicked.png){width="80%"}

If you want to restart the quiz, click the circular arrow. 

::: {.callout-important}

## Warning

Restarting the quiz re-sets your progress! All chosen answers will become un-clicked 
again. 

:::

![](imgs/restart.png){width="80%"}

Once you're done with the quiz, click the double-check marks to proceed to the 
final evaluation screen. 

![](imgs/finalize.png){width="80%"}

There, you'll see a breakdown of your answers including tips and explanations 
of things you might have gotten wrong. 

![](imgs/results.png){width="80%"}

We recommend that you carefully read through all content and all training
questions. You can take as much time as you need. Also remember to take breaks!

Click [here](gdpr_quiz.qmd) to begin.
